It will save me personally a lot of time<br><br>Regards<br><br>Graeme<br><br>Graeme Holdaway<br><br>Media Services Manager<br><br>Media Services/Library<br><br>Birkbeck College<br><br>Malet Street<br><br>Bloomsbury<br><br>London<br><br>WC1E 7HX<br><br>Tel 020 3073 8068<br><br>Mobile 07946 148810<br><br>Email g.holdaway@bbk.ac.uk <mailto:g.holdaway@bbk.ac.uk><br><br>http://www.bbk.ac.uk/media-services/ <http://www.bbk.ac.uk/media-services/><br><br>From: Bloomsbury Media Cloud Support [mailto:BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Sherman, Sarah<br>Sent: 03 March 2015 08:07<br>To: BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Introducing Edit in the MediaCore Chooser<br><br><http://mediacore.us2.list-manage1.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=d0720478a9&e=c170a7376c><br><br>Edit Videos in the MediaCore Chooser [...] Sherman, Sarah 2015-03-03T08:06:46+00:00 2015-03-03T08:06:46+00:00 Introducing Edit in the MediaCore Chooser https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT;337175a4.1503 [https://gallery.mailchimp.com/fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2/images/8de105a5-0cad-42cc-acda-00423d1ac3a9.png]<http://mediacore.us2.list-manage1.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=d0720478a9&e=c170a7376c><br><br>Edit Videos in the MediaCore Chooser<br><br>[https://gallery.mailchimp.com/fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2/images/0b31e515-67ba-465d-9cea-8f6398865009.jpg]<br><br>Great news: We've added the ability to edit content, view drafts, and publish drafts directly from your Learning Management Platform using the Chooser.<br><br>Now, with one click from the Chooser you'll be re-directed to the edit media page where you can upload a new video, change the title, description, and much more. [...] Sherman, Sarah 2015-02-25T17:10:13+00:00 2015-02-25T17:10:13+00:00 On\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdpremise VS Cloud Video Hosting https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT;54ff0d2f.1502 [https://gallery.mailchimp.com/fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2/images/8de105a5-0cad-42cc-acda-00423d1ac3a9.png]<http://mediacore.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=560d7f1b46&e=4173bce6bb><br><br>On\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdpremise VS Cloud Video Hosting<br><br>[https://gallery.mailchimp.com/fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2/images/188eda8f-1a88-497c-9a77-a2a695afa037.jpg]<http://mediacore.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=0c18bf02fb&e=4173bce6bb><br><br>Once upon a time, universities across the land adopted locally-hosted video streaming servers.<br><br>But times have changed \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd and in a mobile-centric, on\ufffd\ufffd\ufffddemand world, many institutions are now looking to the cloud to deliver the video experience that students and professors have come to expect in 2015. [...] Sherman, Sarah 2015-02-18T15:13:39+00:00 2015-02-18T15:13:39+00:00 MediaCore update follow-up and next meeting https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT;930c0fe9.1502 Dear All,<br><br>Thanks to those who joined yesterday afternoon's MediaCore update. For those unable to attend, the session was recorded - please let me know if you would like the link to the recording.<br><br>We covered the following areas:<br><br>* ??Flexibility over the theme of the web-based version<br>* LTI improvements with Moodle e.g. all courses a user has access to will be available in the chooser<br>* Search improvements - based on use of service "Algolio"; real-time searching coming later in the year and available within Moodle, too. In-video search also coming soon.<br>* Automatic captioning (similar to YouTube) [...] Sherman, Sarah 2015-02-16T10:31:21+00:00 2015-02-16T10:31:21+00:00 REMINDER: Remote MediaCore update - Tues 17th Feb https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT;5800fc8e.1502 Just a reminder that tomorrow's update with MediaCore takes place at 3.30 until 5pm. [...] Sherman, Sarah 2014-11-04T09:48:53+00:00 2014-11-04T09:48:53+00:00 Bloomsbury Media Cloud Update https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT;d9d46a6.1411 Dear all,<br><br>Interface update<br>You might have spotted that the Bloomsbury Media Cloud site has been updated:<br>http://media.bloomsburymediacloud.org<http://media.bloomsburymediacloud.org/><br>For the most part, I think it looks fine but I'll probably make a few minor tweaks.<br><br>Bloomsbury support<br>As a reminder, if you need support with the platform, please give me a shout - or contact the local administrator in your College who can create user accounts on the platform:<br>Leo Havemann, Birkbeck - l.havemann@bbk.ac.uk<br>Tim Neumann, IOE - t.neumann@ioe.ac.uk<br>Jo Stroud, LSHTM - joanna.stroud@lshtm.ac.uk<br>Ben Audsley/Alistair Spark, RVC - learn@rvc.ac.uk<br>Linda O'Sullivan/Sultan Wadud, SOAS - ble@soas.ac.uk [...] Sherman, Sarah 2014-10-24T14:11:30+00:00 2014-10-24T14:11:30+00:00 MediaCore Summer Blog Digest https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT;50441660.1410 [https://gallery.mailchimp.com/fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2/images/f10bbac6-f9c6-4d10-aefb-b44b6d82a915.png]<br><br>Summer Blog Recap<br><br>We've had a busy summer, with the release of C<http://mediacore.us2.list-manage1.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=8df5ccefcc&e=c170a7376c>apture for Chrome<http://mediacore.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=2e7d11cd07&e=c170a7376c> and a bunch of updates<http://mediacore.us2.list-manage2.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=d23ee4a3b7&e=c170a7376c> to MediaCore. We also released a free eBook and shared some stories and how-to's on the blog. We hope you find these useful!<br><br>[https://gallery.mailchimp.com/fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2/images/bb80e6d3-1fbb-4ba3-9015-da35166af540.jpg]<http://mediacore.us2.list-manage1.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=1fafce345e&e=c170a7376c><br>Campus-wide lecture capture at DCU<br>Dublin City University has developed a terrific lecture and content capture solution.<br>Learn more<http://mediacore.us2.list-manage2.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=bf5259e22d&e=c170a7376c>. [...] Leo Havemann 2014-09-24T15:59:08+01:00 2014-09-24T15:59:08+01:00 Re: MediaCore Capture for Chrome https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT;8bd55484.1409 I've just installed and tried this out quickly and it seems super easy<br>to use.<br><br>Cheers<br><br>Leo<br><br>From: Bloomsbury Media Cloud Support<br>[mailto:BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Sherman, Sarah<br>Sent: 24 September 2014 15:13<br>To: BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: MediaCore Capture for Chrome<br><br>MediaCore<br><http://mediacore.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da3<br>1e7d2&id=e8edfca58e&e=c170a7376c><br><br>Facebook<br><http://mediacore.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da3<br>1e7d2&id=2a08c7116f&e=c170a7376c><br><br>Twitter<br><http://mediacore.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da3<br>1e7d2&id=bbeb6e3f8a&e=c170a7376c><br><br>Introducing the easiest way to record your screen and webcam<br><br><https://gallery.mailchimp.com/fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2/images/941da76d<br>-acb8-40c2-a6e4-fc7be93ab419.jpg><br><br>We're really excited to release of the newest member of the Capture<br>family: MediaCore Capture for Google Chrome. [...] Sherman, Sarah 2014-09-24T14:13:19+00:00 2014-09-24T14:13:19+00:00 MediaCore Capture for Chrome https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT;4cbef8e1.1409 [MediaCore]<http://mediacore.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=e8edfca58e&e=c170a7376c> [Facebook] <http://mediacore.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=2a08c7116f&e=c170a7376c> [Twitter] <http://mediacore.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=bbeb6e3f8a&e=c170a7376c><br><br>Introducing the easiest way to record your screen and webcam<br><br>[https://gallery.mailchimp.com/fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2/images/941da76d-acb8-40c2-a6e4-fc7be93ab419.jpg]<br><br>We're really excited to release of the newest member of the Capture family: MediaCore Capture for Google Chrome.<br><br>Available today from the Chrome Store, Capture for Chrome offers students, instructors and administrators full desktop screen recording and webcam recording functionality - straight from their web browser. Uploading your video to your institution's MediaCore only takes a couple of clicks. I'm getting in touch with MediaCore now to resolve this ASAP.<br><br>Will keep you updated.<br><br>Cheers,<br>Sarah Sherman, Sarah 2014-09-11T10:49:18+00:00 2014-09-11T10:49:18+00:00 New features in the Bloomsbury Media Cloud https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BLE-CLOUDSUPPORT;d2b64836.1409 [MediaCore]<http://mediacore.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=f82fabc9af&e=c170a7376c> [Facebook] <http://mediacore.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=3fcc76d09c&e=c170a7376c> [Twitter] <http://mediacore.us2.list-manage1.com/track/click?u=fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2&id=038bd5eb5b&e=c170a7376c><br><br>Announcing three new<br>features in MediaCore<br><br>[https://gallery.mailchimp.com/fd201aa65229a0f38da31e7d2/images/17d9eaed-2d71-4291-8f6d-a9a96c2cf828.jpeg]<br><br>We recently released three new features to help you better customize your MediaCore library: the History Tab, Content Licensing and the Author byline field.<br><br>History Tab<br>This tab displays the lifeline of a media item, tracking the latest modifications. Selecting the History dropdown shows when a media item was created, which user uploaded it and when it was last published.
